overview:
Jinesh is the Director of Idyllic Software. He started his career as a Software Developer himself has has worked in several Chicago based companies such as Norvax Inc, Cars.com, Sears & Roebuck and others.

His keen interest in forming a company which operates as a platform for the associates working with it was the reason to form Idyllic Software.

Being fond of good ideas Idyllic Software strictly restricts itself to work with small businesses, startups and digital agencies.

Jinesh is presently in Pune, India with his family.
